body.p: The Board therefore clarified that a participant in a multi‑employer defined benefit plan must recognise the asset or liability arising from that contractual agreement if the participant:

li.p: accounts for that participation on a defined contribution basis in accordance with paragraph 34 because it has insufficient information to apply defined benefit accounting, but
has a contractual agreement that determines how a surplus would be distributed or a deficit funded.
